name: PlayAbly
long_description:
PlayAbly turns ignored touchpoints into mini-games that capture attention, drive action, and generate real-time first-party dataâ€”across eCommerce, B2B funnels, restaurants, and in-store retail. As attention spans shrink to six seconds, brands can't afford lifeless popups, forms, or landing pages. We replace them with gamified conversion layersâ€”quizzes, swipe games, stackersâ€”that perform like performance marketing.

At Unity, our founding team helped personalize gameplay and ads for over 2 billion users. Now, we're bringing that behavioral insight to brand engagement, building a no-code platform where anyone can launch PlayAbly experiences in minutes. Think: instead of a "Spin to Win," a match-3 game that sells your product, segments your audience, and gets 4Ã— the opt-ins.

Why now? Retargeting costs are up. Email/SMS open rates are down. And todayâ€™s customers are conditioned by the dopamine loops of TikTok and mobile games. Generic funnels canâ€™t competeâ€”but interactive ones can.

PlayAbly is already driving results:

Classkick (B2B): 5Ã— ROI, 3Ã— higher email open rates

Skout Snacks (DTC): 7Ã— ROI, 20% higher AOV, 4Ã— opt-in rates

89% of previously lost sessions re-engaged through PlayAbly games

We monetize on a usage + performance model, enabling fast adoption and deep long-term value. We're building a new category: AI-powered gamification that converts attention into intent, on any surface where customers meet brands.

https://www.playably.ai
one_liner: We build games to help brands engage, convert, and retain customers

Kite is as easy as Canva, but your videos will look like they came out of OpenAI or Figma.

- Display recordings on 3D mockup devices (MacBooks, iPhones etc)
- Combine unlimited recordings into one video
- Edit, adjust speed and trim recordings
- Add text scenes and text annotations alongside recordings
- AI voiceovers using state of the art text to speech models
- Free music library
- Brand kitâ€“upload your logos, colors and fonts
- Start from our template library or start from scratch

Kite is used by hundreds of YC companies for launch videos, social media posts, landing page demos, changelog updates, feature releases and more.

Our AI agents handle lead capture, enrichment, routing, follow-up, and CRO testing â€” automating what used to require full marketing ops teams. Customers see a 30% lift in conversions in under 2 weeks, and our partial response capture feature collects 50% more emails from form drop-offs.

name: Typa
long_description:
We help businesses capture what resonates, make it repeatable, and turn attention into lasting momentum. With Typa, you can build a scalable inbound growth engine with content that compounds.

We make this possible through three pillars:

1. A tone of voice that always sounds like you. Typa learns your style, cadence, and perspective so every piece of content reflects your authentic voice.

2. A knowledge base that updates in real time. Your digital clone continuously absorbs everything you say and create, ensuring your content always reflects your latest thinking.

3. A personal ghostwriter thatâ€™s always just a call away. Puff is your 24/7 AI ghostwriter and strategist, available via phone or WhatsApp whenever you want to brainstorm, plan, or execute.

Currently supported channels: X, LinkedIn, Bluesky, and blog/newsletters.

A typical Unusual customer sees more than a 40% increase in traffic from AI models within a month of going live.

Beyond driving more traffic, customers have used Unusual to shift modelsâ€™ perception of their brand from â€œnicheâ€ to â€œenterprise-platformâ€, from â€œscrappyâ€ to â€œcustomer-obsessedâ€, and from â€œgood for startupsâ€ to â€œa solid bet for the middle marketâ€.

We work with top companies including Reducto, Monarch Money, and more.

Alex and Jason have been best friends for 8+ years. They met at TJHSST, became nationally ranked debate partners, and later coworkers at Datadog.
